author: Evren Güntürkün
comment: Very good designed interface and very useful app, it works like a charm, just 2 suggestions: it would be very helpful if you add adjustable rpm notification , so it would be possible to adjust shifting and a notification for not eco driving, so no need to keep an eye on screen so much. Overheating while black box and sometimes running in background and draining battery is also problem for me too,

author: Kevin B
comment: Finally a dashcam app that doesn't freeze constantly! Only thing I don't like is that it records speed and other pointless data with the video, with no ability to turn it off. It clutters up the playback screen.

author: MIKE Abbs
comment: good app but if you need to use it for evidence for your speed or location it's no good. You can't say to judge look at my phone. Needs software for PC.

author: Gildong Hong
comment: 혹시 녹화 시작음,종료음은 무음으로 바꾸거나 끌수 없나요? 폰 자체 음량은 다 낮춰도 계속 소리가나서 조금 불편합니다 ㅠㅠ

author: Kazzidi Deems
comment: I love the user interface.  Its just that my phone holder keeps my phone on portrait, not landscape.  There is no option to change this.  Guess I'll keep using my other cam app.

author: Jose Lopez
comment: Great interface and gages. But choppy video and map does not work.  It would be an awesome app if fixed

author: Ивайло Минков
comment: Great app but unfortunately it has dropped on support and none of my questions on the G+ group got answered. Last update of the app was almost one year ago. Still I would give 4 stars as it misses some functionality like ... auto youtube(or somewhere else) upload, modifying on some fixed OBD params,  bigger timeframe for files (5 minutes is the biggest one so on an hour drive you'll get 6-7 files.... and if you want to uploaded them to youtube you'll end up with 6-7 separate clips there.....

author: Cliff Tavares
comment: Not bad, would be better if the data like speed, date and other types of data could be included with the final mp4 file and not create an additional smi file that can only be read by some players only. My point is, make it save that data within the video file itself and not a separated file. If this happens, you might very well have created the best dash cam / black box app available for Android. Seriously think about it and if available on the next update I will change my review to a 5 stars.

author: Strider's Scene
comment: Really good dash cam ! The cam is awesome during daylight hrs & it does exactly what it says ! The only DOWNSIDE to it is the cam is way to dark at night & you can't really see a great deal that's the reason only 4 🌟 rating

author: A K
comment: It works perfectly, thanks. It would be nice if the speed data would be encrypted to allow to prove innocence in case of an accident

author: ZaZa M.
comment: This application is the best among black box cameras for the time being. An the ECU monitoring feature is just great!

author: Raslin777
comment: No Support for Portrait. Other wise good app.

author: emanuel tolosa
comment: Great app but on question , if my car does 6 liter every 100 km what do i input in fuel consumption adjustment ?

author: Keith Smith
comment: Black screen. Crashes on launch

author: Dusty Waymire Waymire
comment: No video capturing on Galaxy S5

author: kang hudi
comment: Keren, Realtime, cukuplah sebagai bukti jika terjadi hal-hal yang tidak diinginkan dijalan

author: Jack Smith
comment: Does not record video !!!

author: Harvinder Singh Harnal
comment: Need HUD feature as well

author: James Katon
comment: This could be a good app only it dont function on a GM COMMODORE
Great recorder. Some menu options not showing in English though.

As a dashcam, it's the only app that seems to work reasonably glitch free. Lock/unlock the screen, phone calls or other interruptions do not seem to upset the video recording noticeably. No problems playing back video with the internal player or with MX Player. I've been looking at a handful of other dashcam apps and they all glitch, stop recording or crash and have processor issues. I've bought the Pro version and I'm looking forward to trying the OBD monitoring.

author: Digi Vince
comment: Video files won't play in any player on my phone or PC. It seems like a decent app with a good feature set but if it can't actually save videos properly then there's no way I'm paying for the full version.
title: Files unreadable

author: Lincoln Valverde
comment: The Auto launch option doesn't work properly on Samsung Galaxy Note 3 Neo N7502 and Motorola Razr D3 XT920.
title: Auto launch option doesn't work properly

author: Jerjay Sy
comment: Very usefull

author: Leonid Berman
comment: After finshing using the app, the process continues to run in the memory of the device and dramatcally drain the battery. Every time I had to stop manually the process. My device Samsung Tab 3 SM-T310. I bought the app to support the developer. I hope Pro version will not be problematic as the Free version.
title: It's OK but this app have a problem

author: Ridler42
comment: Works well on HTC 1. Speed display on camera screen could be smaller. Car power maintains battery level when on Batt saver setting.   Just.  Uses lots of CPU power, especially when using Google Maps which integrate with it, so low end phones will struggle with this app. Apart from that works well. You need a decent camera on your phone for this to work well.
title: Good

author: William Watkins
comment: Like it...the only one that seems to work well at night and not try and focus and turn everything blurry. The bad...the speedometer...too big and just annoying. Updated - found button to remove display obstacles, but night focus is horrible... Understand lack of light, but no app only device video is clear. So the app some how doesn't focus well. If app developer can help or assist that would be great
title: Good, but cluttered

author: Bean Spiller
comment: It overheats my phone every time I use it for an extended time, I already have it set to the lowest resolution, and all the extra's turned off (it still overheats). Also, when I answer calls (while the app is running), this app keeps turning my speaker phone (setting) on and off randomly. I love your app, I would hate to replace you. Please fix these problems ASAP! I used to use this app everyday! Not so much anymore, I'll try it again after the next update.
title: I found a couple of problems!!

author: Badoui Hobeiche
comment: It's a nice app and I would change my rating to 5 if the car speed can be hide from recorded files but not from the actual app. If you show your insurance a file with your speed over one km/hour the speed limit you're done, not good. Therefore it's useless this app to me unless this change... thanks
title: Good but need some work

author: Jeff Dodson
comment: I just downloaded the app, I've never done so before. When I try to run the app, it opens to the start up screen with the "FREE" version clearly displayed, but within a half second or so the app displays a pop up which reads "Evaluation period has expired" then the app closes. I'd lime to evaluate the app to consider purchasing.
title: No Evaluation Period

author: Dalia Armada
comment: So far, so good. I'll try it for a few days and I'll give it 5 stars. Take forever and ever to launch the app. This is my second day trying it and it is very uncomfortable to open it. Uninstalling. Freeze!
title: Excelente!

author: Sorin Toma
comment: I'm using it on my car android stereo and I've stopped autostarting Torque Pro. Yes, it could be good! I will buy the pro just to support the dev once the freezing / over CPU load issue will be fixed.
title: Unfortunately freezes more times than it works.

author: Has Kam
comment: I was rear ended a few years ago so I really need a car dvr that has front cam with mini rear cam window on the screen recording simultaneously. Is this feature in the paid app? If so I will buy it! Thanks! ;-)
title: Does this have front/back camera functionality?

author: Ilgar Veliyev
comment: I liked it from first use. The only thing which is getting me crazy is a speed. In my case OBD speed is lower than Gps speed. This is the only reason to do not buy full version. If developer will add option to choose which speed to display i' ll buy it immediately.
title: Best dash app.

author: George Nica
comment: Nice app, pretty intuitive - it takes a while figuring out the settings. It doesn't seem to allow saving videos to SD card, despite what it's advertised. Also, not sure why it requests root access, what feature am I missing for not allowing it?...
title: Very nice

author: Kodey Kinder
comment: Will only open start up screen then (evaluation time expired) shows... Regardless of uninstalling then reinstalling. FIX PLEASE!
title: Doesn't work

author: James Bowen
comment: I've tried a handful of these car cam apps and this one works best for my LG G3.
title: Best of the bunch

author: sunilcse04
comment: Dash cam works fine but it records only the main cam n not from selfie cam. Any suggestions?
title: Caroo das cam

author: Rahul Bhatnagar
comment: Wish to have cloud sync of data
title: All in one solution

author: Lee Studd
comment: One of the better dashcam apps. But it drains the phone battery even when plugged in.
